        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if not lower-hex format
        See Also:
        Span.id()

      • traceId

        public Span.Builder traceId(long high,
                            long low)
        Encodes 64 or 128 bits from the input into a hex trace ID.
        Parameters:
        high - Upper 64bits of the trace ID. Zero means the trace ID is 64-bit.
        low - Lower 64bits of the trace ID.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if both values are zero

      • parentId

        public Span.Builder parentId(long parentId)
        Encodes 64 bits from the input into a hex parent ID. Unsets the Span.parentId() if the input is 0.
        See Also:
        Span.parentId()

      • parentId

        See Also:

      • id

        public Span.Builder id(long id)
        Encodes 64 bits from the input into a hex span ID.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input is zero
        See Also:
        Span.id()
